1: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    2: %%% @author cdw
    3: %%% Created 2019/03/21
    4: %%% @doc
    5: %%% @end
    6: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    7: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
    8: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    9: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   10:     init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   11:     all/0]).
   12: -export([add_service/1, friend_by_name/1, friend_by_expertise/1,
   13:     friend_with_services/1, accounts/1, enemies/1]).
   14: 
   15: all() -> [add_service, friend_by_name, friend_by_expertise,
   16:     friend_with_services, accounts, enemies].
   17: 
   18: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   19:     Priv = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   20:     application:load(mnesia),
   21:     application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   22:     application:load(mafiapp),
   23:     mafiapp:install([node()]),
   24:     application:start(mnesia),
   25:     application:start(mafiapp),
   26:     Config.
   27: 
   28: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   29:     application:stop(mnesia),
   30:     ok.
   31: 
   32: init_per_testcase(add_service, Config) ->
   33:     Config;
   34: init_per_testcase(accounts, Config) ->
   35:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Consigliere", [], [you], consigliere),
   36:     Config;
   37: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   38:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   39:     Config.
   40: 
   41: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: %% services can go both way: from a friend to the boss, or
   45: %% from the boss to a friend! A boss friend is required!
   46: add_service(_Config) ->
   47:     {error, unknown_friend} = mafiapp:add_service("from name",
   48:         "to name",
   49:         {1946,5,23},
   50:         "a fake service"),
   51:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   52:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Alan Parsons",
   53:         [{twitter,"@ArtScienceSound"}],
   54:         [{born, {1948,12,20}},
   55:             musician, 'audio engineer',
   56:             producer, "has projects"],
   57:         mixing),
   58:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Alan Parsons", "Don Corleone",
   59:         {1973,3,1},
   60:         "Helped release a Pink Floyd album").
   61: 
   62: friend_by_name(_Config) ->
   63:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Pete Cityshend",
   64:         [{phone, "418-542-3000"},
   65:             {email, "quadrophonia@example.org"},
   66:             {other, "yell real loud"}],
   67:         [{born, {1945,5,19}},
   68:             musician, popular],
   69:         music),
   70:     {"Pete Cityshend",
   71:         _Contact, _Info, music,
   72:         _Services} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("Pete Cityshend"),
   73:     undefined = mafiapp:friend_by_name(make_ref()).
   74: 
   75: friend_by_expertise(_Config) ->
   76:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("A Red Panda",
   77:         [{location, "in a zoo"}],
   78:         [animal,cute],
   79:         climbing),
   80:     [{"A Red Panda",
   81:         _Contact, _Info, climbing,
   82:         _Services}] = mafiapp:friend_by_expertise(climbing),
   83:     [] = mafiapp:friend_by_expertise(make_ref()).
   84: 
   85: friend_with_services(_Config) ->
   86:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Someone", [{other, "at the fruit stand"}],
   87:         [weird, mysterious], shadiness),
   88:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Don Corleone", "Someone",
   89:         {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"),
   90:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Someone", "Don Corleone",
   91:         {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"),
   92:     %% We don't care about the order. The test was made to fit
   93:     %% whatever the functions returned.
   94:     {"Someone",
   95:         _Contact, _Info, shadiness,
   96:         [{to, "Don Corleone", {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"},
   97:             {from, "Don Corleone", {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"}]} =
   98:         mafiapp:friend_by_name("Someone").
   99: 
  100: %% It should be possible to find all people who owe us things.
  101: accounts(_Config) ->
  102:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Gill Bates", [{email, "ceo@macrohard.com"}],
  103:         [clever,rich], computers),
  104:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Consigliere", "Gill Bates",
  105:         {1985,11,20}, "Bought 15 copies of software"),
  106:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Gill Bates", "Consigliere",
  107:         {1986,8,17}, "Made computer faster"),
  108:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Pierre Gauthier", [{other, "city arena"}],
  109:         [{job, "sports team GM"}], sports),
  110:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Pierre Gauthier", "Consigliere", {2009,6,30},
  111:         "Took on a huge, bad contract"),
  112:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Wayne Gretzky", [{other, "Canada"}],
  113:         [{born, {1961,1,26}}, "hockey legend"],
  114:         hockey),
  115:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Consigliere", "Wayne Gretzky", {1964,1,26},
  116:         "Gave first pair of ice skates"),
  117:     %% Wayne Gretzky owes us something so the debt is negative
  118:     %% Gill Bates are equal
  119:     %% Gauthier is owed a service.
  120:     [{-1,"Wayne Gretzky"},
  121:         {0,"Gill Bates"},
  122:         {1,"Pierre Gauthier"}] = mafiapp:debts("Consigliere"),
  123:     [{1, "Consigliere"}] = mafiapp:debts("Wayne Gretzky").
  124: 
  125: enemies(_Config) ->
  126:     undefined = mafiapp:find_enemy("Edward"),
  127:     ok = mafiapp:add_enemy("Edward", [{bio, "Vampire"},
  128:         {comment, "He sucks (blood)"}]),
  129:     {"Edward", [{bio, "Vampire"},
  130:         {comment, "He sucks (blood)"}]} =
  131:         mafiapp:find_enemy("Edward"),
  132:     ok = mafiapp:enemy_killed("Edward"),
  133:     undefined = mafiapp:find_enemy("Edward").
  134:
